kep.converter package¶

Submodules¶

kep.converter.word module¶

Dumps data from tables in Word document to csv file.

Call:
make_csv(data_folder)

kep.converter.word.close_ms_word(app)[source]¶

kep.converter.word.dump_doc_files_to_csv(file_list, csv)[source]¶

Write tables from .doc in file_list into one csv file.

kep.converter.word.folder_to_csv(folder)[source]¶

Make single csv based on all STEI .doc files in folder.
